Title: Successful login with valid credentials
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click login button

Title: Login with invalid email
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter invalid email | Enter valid password | Click login button
Expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

Title: Login with invalid password
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click login button
Expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

Title: Account lock after 3 failed login attempts
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click login button | Repeat invalid password entry two more times

Title: Reset password via Forgot Password link
Steps: Navigate to login page | Click on Forgot Password link | Enter registered email | Submit reset request
Expected: Password reset email is sent to the registered email

Title: Error message for locked account
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click login button | Wait for 10 minutes | Attempt to log in again
Expected: Error message indicating account is locked is displayed

Title: Multiple invalid login attempts
Steps: Navigate to login page | Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click login button | Repeat invalid password entry three times
Expected: Account is locked after third invalid attempt
